column2: "Hmm. Hmmmm! The ARKS' beloved Guardian duo seem to be getting along with each other a little too well!"
"I smell an investigation! My groundbreaking scandal senses are tingling, Tia!"

"I think they're just good friends. Ah...
<%me>, Matoi, terribly sorry for disturbing you."
"Hehe. Lively as always I see, Patty, Tia?"
"You bet! Patty n' Tia, your number one local news outlet, deals in good cheer!"
"You'd think a news outlet would deal more in the actual news..."
"Patty does have a point though. It's rare to see you two walk around the ARKS ship so casually."

"You always seemed to be running around, always having somewhere to be.
<%me> especially."
"Hey, wait! So you thought so too, Tia! I know a scandal when I see one!"
"Give it a rest, my dear dumb sister."
"N-no, you've got it wrong! There's nothing weird happening like that at all!"
"...Matoi. Why are you even entertaining this?"
"ALRIGHT! <%me>! Is the scandal not taking place here, but rather in the Bridge?!"
"There's nothing going on."
"And if there was?"
"You said that so flatly..."
"So there IS something going on! If you thought you could fool this young lady, nice try, you two! Think again!"
"Well, uh... it's all in the spirit of inquiry? I guess?"
"More like her spirit of nosiness."
"It isn't something that would be brought to light. We release news based on timing and relevance to the current goings-on."
"Don't worry. If you are hiding something, we know that you must have a good reason for it."
"But, alas! This really gives me a craving to investigate! Like, hey, maybe we could work together! Or something."
"Work together?"
"If there was any way we could help, she means. Since you and <%me> are always doing the impossible for us all the time."
"We're ARKS too, ya know! Well, I mean... we're nothing compared to you two, but still!"
"Patty... Tia. Thank you."
"Just hearing you say that... Yeah. It really makes me feel better."
"Heheheh! Seems the pen is mightier than the Resta! Lemme know if you need any more healing in the future!"
"With moderation, of course. I heard that too many pointless conversations can actually tire you out even more instead."
"Rude!"
